name: School Lunch Box Maker Chef
description:
It’s time to give some time for your Kid’s Lunch Box Cooking before going to your work. Cooking Food is important part of life and kids need to eat fast food lunch box every day. So, make some different high school lunch food daily that kids can eat high school lunch box cooking food easily.

Welcome to the School Lunch Food Making game ! Let’s start making food for kid’s school lunch box. Being a parent it’s your job to take care of your kids and making school lunch box is one of your jobs.

Make some different cooking food like burger , sandwich and cupcake daily with this cooking kitchen food game and show your amazing fast food making kitchen skills. Accept every Kitchen Cooking Challenge and Be a best fast food maker.

Choose your favorite food and start making. Play mini game before making fast food for freshness and find difference between two different images. Collect vegetables and then go to make the burger and sandwich .

Enjoy fruit cutting for cold drink making. Make yummy cupcake and pack in the decorated school lunch box. Now you can eat high school lunch box cooking food .

Features:
Enjoy different fast food making for kid’s school lunch box.
Get experience of lunch box cooking food making.
Show best performance as you can for next scenes unlocking.
Improve your kitchen cooking abilities.
Highly attractive graphics with ultra-addictive background sounds.
Smooth and interactive game play control.
